column4: can anyone point me in the direction of a gide(or tell me if its that simple) to setting up samba to "see" (read/write) to/from my windows comps on the network?
you can just go to "Places > Connect to Server" or even "Places > Network servers" and choose Windows Network.
there are 0 items under the Windows Network thing
hm. I'm in a bit deep then.
